import { Component } from 'react'; import './randomChar.scss'; import mjolnir from '../../resources/img/mjolnir.png'; class RandomChar extends Component { state={ name:null, description:null, thumbnail:null, homepage:null, wiki:null } render(){ return (

Thor

As the Norse God of thunder and lightning, Thor wields one of the greatest weapons ever made, the enchanted hammer Mjolnir. While others have described Thor as an over-muscled, oafish imbecile, he's quite smart and compassionate...

homepage
Wiki

Random character for today!
Do you want to get to know him better?

Or choose another one

) } } export default RandomChar;
